text:
@RandPaul @NYGovCuomo KY got $148 billion in handouts from the federal government while NY paid $116.2 billion over the last 4 years. And NY has more than 5x people than KY.

Due to the impact of COVID19, NY's budget deficit next year will be $13 billion. That is only a third of KY's yearly handout.
